opening_theme: #1: "Ganbare Dokaben (がんばれドカベン)" by Koorogi '73 (ep 1-106)
#2: "Kyuu Nin no March (九人のマーチ)" by Suginami Jidou Gasshoudan (ep 107-128)
#3: "Seishun Fever (Combat March) (青春フィーバー (コンバット・マーチ))" by Columbia All Stars (コロムビア・オールスターズ) (ep 129-163)
ending_theme: #1: "Ah Seishun yo Itsumademo (ああ青春よいつまでも)" by Koorogi '73
#2: "Kimi Koso Minna no Idol da! (きみこそみんなのアイドルだ!)" by Koorogi '73, Suginami Jidou Gasshoudan
#3: "Taiyou no Ko (太陽の子)" by Columbia All Stars (コロムビア・オールスターズ)
